meanings.definition: The simultaneous perception of two images of a single object.
meanings.sent1: She experienced diplopias when looking at the clock.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her diplopias as a result of eye strain.
meanings.sent3: The diplopias made her feel like she was seeing double trouble!
meanings.sent4: His diplopias turned the world into a confusing pair of images.
meanings.sent5: The diplopias made it seem like there were two clocks ticking at once.

meanings.definition: The medical term for double vision.
meanings.sent1: The patient's diplopias required immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: Double vision is often referred to as diplopias in medical circles.
meanings.sent3: His diplopias made him feel like he was seeing twins everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The diplopias clouded his view, making everything a blurry duo.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing diplopias can be disorienting and unsettling.
